snippet: The first full-year budget of Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s government promised a major increase in public spending on infrastructure and a lowering of the corporate tax rate, but it failed to offer any dramatic reforms.
abstract: Indian Prime Min Narendra Modi's government releases first full-year budget, which is welcomed by Indian industry for its major increase in public spending on infrastructure and lowering of corporate tax rate.

byline.original: By ELLEN BARRY and NEHA THIRANI BAGRI

lead_paragraph: The first full-year budget of Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s government promised a major increase in public spending on infrastructure and a lowering of the corporate tax rate, but it failed to offer any dramatic reforms.

headline.main: India’s New Budget Aims to Boost Growth
headline.print_headline: India Unveils New Budget Aimed at Increasing Growth
